bwwExcerpt: Who knows what Jerry Seinfeld did as the show's director, but Quinn's musings are full of Seinfeld's brand of observational humor. Quinn has a chummy rapport with his audience and brings plenty of laughs, but the show lacks the ingenuity of "Long Story Short" and the bite of "Unconstitutional." It's too bad he didn't delve deeper into New York history and culture, rather than just bring up generalized stereotypes.
